name: Game Jam Simulator
description: In the spirit of Desert Bus for Hope and its creator, LoadingReadyRun, it's a meta game for Desert Bus for Hope Game Jam! (Meta humor may have been left on the cutting room floor due to time.) Take part in a local game jam and try to create the game of your dreams in 72 hours! Don't be afraid to ask for help, and never be afraid to hit the break room.
